title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Wellness-Integrated Competency Development Program for Nurse Anesthetists

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of nursing anesthesia tasks and clinical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can improve their ability to explore and utilize wellness resources by over 90%
Participants can acquire over 80% proficiency in applying holistic health principles to actual clinical cases
Participants can develop stress management strategies to reduce burnout during work by over 50%
Participants select three wellness education materials, recommend them 1:1 to five peers, and receive feedback from â‰¥80% of peers stating, "The recommendation was clear and easy to understand"
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
